Cherry Crunch

Source: Lenora Knight

Ingredients

  • 1 can cherries
  • 1 1/2 cups oats
  • 1/4 cup flour
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup sugar
  • 1 tsp cinnamon
  • 1/4 to 1/2 cup butter
  • touch of milk

Instructions

  1. Put cherries in a greased square baking pan
  2. Mix all other ingredients. Put on top of cherries
  3. Bake??
